full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## EHC Demolition

### Project Details
* **Project ID**: R.069710
* **Project Title**: EHC Demolition
* **Location**: 50 Colombine Driveway, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9

### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: PW-__FG-382-81392
* **Publication Date**: 2022-09-21
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-18T14:00:00
* **Solicitation Number**: EP941-230072/A
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Contract Requirements
* **Scope of Work**: Demolish the Environmental Health Centre (EHC) at Tunney’s Pasture, Ottawa.
* **Duration**: 54 weeks after contract award
* **Estimated Cost**: $5,000,001 to $20,000,000
* **Security Requirements**: Designated Organization Screening (DOS) mandatory

### Site Visit and Enquiries
* **Site Visit**: Optional, on September 28th at 10am, at 50 Colombine Driveway, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K9.
* **Enquiries**: Submission deadline is 5 business days prior to the closing date. Contact Gillian Fenwick at gillian.fenwick2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or (343) 999-7495.

### Bid Documents and Submission
* **Bid Documents**: Obtain through the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders) or via the toll-free number 1-855-886-3030.
* **Submission**: Sealed bids will be received at Public Works and Government Services Canada, Bid Receiving Unit, Place du Portage, Phase III, Main Lobby Core 0B2, 11 Laurier Street, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 1C9.

### Language and Eligibility
* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* **Eligibility**: All interested suppliers may submit a bid. However, the procurement will be set-aside under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids have been received from Aboriginal businesses who are
